entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
